p: Citrus hystrix is a medicinal plant that treats many ailments and it is used in many traditional medicines. Based on DPPH and ABTS assays, high antioxidant properties of its extracts were reported. Furthermore, the phytochemical constituents were analyzed and identified by GC-MS. The spectrum of GC-MS confirmed that CHP and CHL contain a number of various bioactive compounds. The nature and beneficial effects on health of these compounds were discussed in Table 6.
